name: He's your valentine
tagline: A collection of gifts for the special man in your life. Spoil him this Valentine's.

gifts.name: Anti-fatigue under eye patches
gifts.description: Has your man been working hard, or playing hard? Help him look his best with these under eye patches.

image.alt_text: Image of Anti-fatigue under eye patches. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Hibiki whisky
gifts.description: Delicious whisky in a delicious keepsake of a bottle. He'll know he has been spoilt.

image.alt_text: Image of Hibiki whisky. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: I love you pie
gifts.description: How would this giant pork pie go down this Valentine's? If it works it works.

image.alt_text: Image of I love you pie. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Roasted Coffee Soy Candle
gifts.description: You want his place to smell good? Why not try this roasted coffee spy candle.

image.alt_text: Image of Roasted Coffee Soy Candle. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Sock Collection
gifts.description: Your man is sure to love these socks of the luxurious kind.

image.alt_text: Image of Sock Collection. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Luxury eye mask
gifts.description: He might not be willing to buy these himself but trust us, he'll appreciate them.

image.alt_text: Image of Luxury eye mask. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Push card wallet from Hardgraft
gifts.description: Level up what's in your man's pocket with this perfectly designed leather card wallet

image.alt_text: Image of Push card wallet from Hardgraft. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Beaumont cocktail shaker
gifts.description: Give your man no excuse to make you the perfect drink.

image.alt_text: Image of Beaumont cocktail shaker. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Craft beer bundle
gifts.description: A bit of variety for the beer lover in your life

image.alt_text: Image of Craft beer bundle. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Face kit for men
gifts.description: Level up his face care regime. He'll appreciate and so will you.

image.alt_text: Image of Face kit for men. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Apple AirPods pro 2
gifts.description: What a gift to get the special someone in your life.

image.alt_text: Image of Apple AirPods pro 2. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Theragun prime
gifts.description: Help him recover from his work outs with the ultimate Theragun.

image.alt_text: Image of Theragun prime. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Niwaki Bento Box
gifts.description: If you also make lunch to go in this stylish lunchbox, he is sure to owe you big time.

image.alt_text: Image of Niwaki Bento Box. A great gift to give someone special.
